pr_title: KEYCLOAK-16679 Add algorithm settings for client assertion signature in OIDC identity broker

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to add slightly more details to this tooltip to specify what exactly does this option mean, when it is needed to be configured etc? My vote is just include everything, which you added to the documentation to this tooltip. So something like this: Signature algorithm to create JWT assertion as client authentication. In the case of JWT signed with private key or Client secret as jwt, it is required. If no algorithm is specified, the following algorithm is adapted. RS256is adapted the in the case of JWT signed with private key. HS256 is adapted the in the case of Client secret as jwt.
